pages.text: This is where Sound Carvers should have been, but now it's all buried in gravel and stone.$(br) $(o)Couldn't they do anything to prevent this from happening?$()$(br2) There is also a village plan at the entrance, it is old but readable.
First floor is an entrance to the village and doesn't have a lot of rooms.
Second floor has four rooms with the same symbol, it must be a residential floor.
Third floor must be an industrial floor.
